name: Get in the Hole (Sart Games)
description:
Get in the Hole is a simple 2D golf game. Each of its 9 holes offers players a new challenge, from moving platforms to portals. No padding to be found in this game.

There are 9 coins to collect (1 per hole), and if you get them all, good job! There's no other reward. The satisfaction should be enough, really.

You best score is shown on the main menu as a reminder of how much better at the game you used to be.

Also, Unity's collider systems don't work 100% of the time (every time), so on the occasion that your ball gets stuck, you can press the R key to reset the level. Of course, you could (ab)use this to get a godly overall score, but that's up to you.
